title: An individual agreement shall be made by the Land-Owning Authority/SRA/the developer so appointed by DRP (SRA) with the eligible occupier of each tenement /unit in the joint names of pramukh occupier and spouse for every structure on the renewal plots
clause_text: An individual agreement shall be made by the Land-Owning Authority/SRA/the developer so appointed by DRP (SRA) with the eligible occupier of each tenement /unit in the joint names of pramukh occupier and spouse for every structure on the renewal plots.

source_pdf.text_snippet: An individual agreement shall be made by the Land-Owning Authority/SRA/the developer so appointed by DRP (SRA) with the eligible occupier of each tenement /unit in the joint names of pramukh occupier
